item.title: Report X-2023090678
item.description:
Report X-2023090678

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-19
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KY, A PACKAGE WITH A UN3481 LITHIUM BATTERY MARK WAS BEING SCANNED INTO A FEEDER TRUCK WHEN A HOLE WAS NOTICED IN THE BOTTOM OF THE BOX. UPON REMOVING THE PACKAGE SMOKE WAS THEN OBSERVED COMING FROM THE PACKAGE. OUTER BOX INSPECTION REVEALED NO SIGNS OF A THERMAL EVENT. A TEAR/HOLE IS OBSERVED ON THE BOTTOM OF THE OUTER BOX. INNER BOX INSPECTION REVEALED ONE MACBOOK PRO WITH VISIBLE SIGNS OF A THERMAL EVENT. THE MACBOOK SHOWED SIGNS OF MELTING, CHARRING, AND BURN MARKS. THE PADDING SURROUNDING THE MACBOOK WAS PARTIALLY MELTED. THE INSIDE OF THE BOX ALSO SHOWED SOME SIGNS OF CHARRING. DOCUMENTATION WITH THE PACKAGE SHOWS THE MACBOOK HAD UNDERGONE DISPLAY AND LID ANGLE SENSOR REPLACEMENT UNDER WARRANTY BY APPLECARE SERVICE. THE PACKAGE WAS BEING SHIPPED TO THE ORIGINAL OWNER IN INDIANA. THE PACKAGE HAD PREVIOUSLY FLOWN FROM IAH TO SDF. AN NRC REPORT WAS MADE ON 9/19/2023 UNDER NRC 1379487.

item.title: Report X-2023090485
item.description:
Report X-2023090485

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED 48 X 10 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF ZEVO INSTANT ACTION ANT, ROACH SPIDER SPRAY WITH ONE LEAKING FROM THE NOZZLE. THERE WERE FIVE INNER BOXES WITH LIMITED QUANTITY MARKINGS. THERE WERE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM PHILADELPHIA, PA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 631FX9, THE UPS STORE, 6574 N STATE ROAD 7, COCONUT CREEK FL 33073.

UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED 48 X 10 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF ZEVO INSTANT ACTION ANT, ROACH SPIDER SPRAY WITH ONE THAT THAT LEAKED FROM THE NOZZLE. THERE WERE FIVE INNER BOXES WITH LIMITED QUANTITY MARKINGS. THERE WERE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM PHILADELPHIA, PA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 0ER308, THE UPS STORE MILITARY BASE ID, 1232 VICKERS AVE., HICKAM AFB HI 96853.

item.title: Report X-2023090242
item.description:
Report X-2023090242

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-12
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE KENTUCKY, RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS WET AND THE SIDE OF THE PACKAGE WAS SPLIT OPEN. DURING PACKAGE REWRAP WE DISCOVERED DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING TWO PANS OF LASAGNA. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED IN THE AIR SERVICE.

item.title: Report X-2023090467
item.description:
Report X-2023090467

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: USPS TRACKING 9505510547073226294662 ORIGINALLY SHIPPED IN THE US MAIL SERVICE FROM ST THOMAS VIRGIN ISLANDS WAS MISSORTED FROM THE USA INTO CANADA. UPS CANADA RETURNED THE PACKAGE TO THE USA USING UPS ACCOUNT 500X42, CC VANCOUVER INTERNATIONAL, 13331 VULCAN WAY, RICHMOND BC V6V1K4, CANADA UNDER SMALL PACKAGE TRACKING NUMBER 1Z8190010113421449. DURING PACKAGE RETURN FROM CANADA, CUSTOMS OFFICIALS AT SDF IN LOUISVILLE, KY DISCOVERED FOUR SMOKE GRENADES INSIDE THE PACKAGE. IN ADDITION TO THE SMOKE GRENADES THE PACKAGE ALSO CONTAINED PERSONAL MAIL, ONE BLITZ JEWELRY CLEANER, ONE SMALL BAG OF SPRINGS, ONE NINTENDO CHARGER, ONE HOVER SOCCER BALL, ONE LASERMAX GUIDE ROD LASER, ONE WEST INDIES GLASS TRAY, ONE DOCTOR NOTE, ONE PIECE OF FABRIC WITH AN AIRBRUSHED PORTRAIT, ONE RITZ CARLTON TOILETRY BAG, AND ONE MICROFIBER CLOTH.

item.title: Report X-2023081913
item.description:
Report X-2023081913

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: INDEPENDENCE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found wet in the trailer, QA was called. We used spill pads to clean up the spilled product. We secured the package and soiled clean up materials in a lined red tote. DescribePack: Cap became loose DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Cap was tightened and package was placed in a lined red tote.

item.title: Report X-2023081881
item.description:
Report X-2023081881

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-24
  • City: INDEPENDENCE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to pick up a leaking package, once QA arrived it was found that the package was a hazmat. Package was put into a lined tote and a spill pad was used to clean up the leaked product. DescribePack: Cap came loose during transit causing internal leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Cap was put back on and tightened and package was up in an upright position in a lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023081625
item.description:
Report X-2023081625

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-21
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The cap on one of the bottles came loose and an internal leakage resulted. Upon being discovered, the box was brought to QA to be worked on. DescribePack: The package had several stains on the outside of it. Upon being opened, the cap on one of the bottles was noticed to be loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed in a spill tote to contain further spillage.
